FuncDef: The reset pim routing-table all command deletes PIM status information from all IPv4 PIM routing entries.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VPN instance name if this parameter is specified, the command deletes PIM status information from all IPv4 PIM routing entries in the specified VPN instance. If this parameter is not specified, the command deletes PIM status information from all IPv4 PIM routing entries in the public network instance.
The value is a string of case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If PIM status information in all IPv4 PIM routing entries is unnecessary, run the reset pim routing-table all command. After this command is run, PIM will terminate IPv4 multicast data forwarding.
Precautions
The reset pim routing-table all command deletes PIM status information of downstream interfaces, but does not delete IGMP or static group join status information and the status of the entries generated through the BGP protocol.
